adrFormatAddress: Pearl Studios:, 519 8th Ave 12th. Fl, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: Our daughter started classes at Actors Technique less than a year ago, and has already had a very positive experience. The classes are taught by engaged, enthusiastic teachers.  The vocal class instructor Jeff is amazing and is now our daughter’s vocal coach; she has made significant progress since working with him.  The industry showcases at the end of each semester are great opportunities to connect with agents and managers.  The performance opportunities are outstanding, including dinner theater cabarets to benefit worthy causes, as well as full-length Broadway musical productions, directed by the incredible, experienced Broadway producer CAT.  Todd, the studio owner, always goes above and beyond for all of the students and their parents, with feedback, supportive words, and recommendations.  This is a terrific studio for children and teens.

originalText.text:
My young daughter was cast in her first full length production with ATNY for Newsies. The professional Broadway instruction by CAT (and countless others) was absolutely incredible. Week after week, the cast rehearsed difficult choreography, scene work, musical numbers, all guided by ATNY. I am so impressed by the growth I’ve witnessed, the incredible friendships formed, and of course the final (sold out!!) performances were a smashing success. Thank you, ATNY. We are forever grateful and can’t wait to continue working with you!
Lisa & Emily (aka Buttons)

originalText.text: Our daughter recently performed with ATNY and it was an amazing experience for the entire family. To say she enjoyed and learned a tremendous amount is an understatement. We were so impressed with the professionalism and level of expertise that Todd, CAT and every chorographer and crew member involved brought to the table. In a few short months our daughter grew as a performer, and we know there is more to come. We are thrilled to be part of the ATNY family. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for being wonderful mentors!

originalText.text: My daughter participated in the Newsies production in CT.  My daughter's singing and acting techniques developed significantly through the rehearsals.  The kids were so lucky to be able to work with the best of the best directors in choreography, music, dance, and costume, and to perform at the fully equipped theater supported by the great stage engineers.  My daughter loved every single rehearsal and the performances.  Looking forward to be part of the next project!!

text.text: My daughter participated in the Newsies production in CT.  My daughter's singing and acting techniques developed significantly through the rehearsals.  The kids were so lucky to be able to work with the best of the best directors in choreography, music, dance, and costume, and to perform at the fully equipped theater supported by the great stage engineers.  My daughter loved every single rehearsal and the performances.  Looking forward to be part of the next project!!

originalText.text: We live in Florida so my daughter has been taking virtual lessons with ATNY since the beginning of the year, which has been amazing already.  She finally got to take classes in persons doing two weeks at their summer camps in NYC.  She had the best time and learned so much.  Todd definitely knows what he is doing and gives the best advice on how to bring out their emotions in their characters they are playing.  All the teachers there are wonderful and I saw so much growth in just these last two weeks. They even bring out talent managers, agents, or casting directors at the end of each session to give more advice, whether it’s in person or virtually.  We can’t wait to continue her journey from home with more virtual lessons with them.  ATNY is definitely one I would recommend if you have a child trying to purchase acting in TV/Film or Broadway.
